about_the_game:
Arcade and casual game enthusiasts, meet Snake Classic 3D Reborn! This fun snake simulator designed with 3D graphics is a modern version of the old classics. Immerse yourself in this fascinating world and embark on an adventure on obstacle-filled maps with your snake character!

Unlimited Fun with Three Different Maps
Snake Classic 3D Reborn comes with three maps, each offering different difficulty levels and visuals:

Fields of Plenty: Guide your snake to collect plenty of blocks in this lush field area. In this map that will develop your attention and reflexes, aim for the highest score by increasing the length of your snake. When you reach a high score, the difficulty will increase as the snake will grow longer. It would be a good move to spread the snake according to the stage before making your next move. In this way, you will reduce the chance of hitting your snake character while collecting new blocks.

Rocky Peaks: This map, set on a snowy platform, offers a visual feast. But you should be careful! Moving quickly and making strategic decisions are the key to success at this level.

Axe & Swinging Hammer: In this most challenging and exciting map, you will struggle in an area full of moving axes. Increase your speed to earn points, avoid obstacles and reach your high score goals!

Fun Gameplay and Goals
The game is based on collecting blocks that appear on the stage with your snake character. With each block, your snake's tail grows longer, thus strengthening your strategic moves in the game. However, be careful not to hit your own tail! The two antennas on the right and left of your snake's head show the location of the blocks. You can reach your goals faster by turning your snake in the direction of whichever antenna is lit. This mechanic allows you to develop both strategy and skill.

Express Yourself: Eight Different Snake Skins
The game offers the opportunity to develop not only your skills but also your style. With the gold you earn, you can unlock eight different snake skins. These skin options will allow you to personalize your character and add variety to your gameplay. Which snake will you choose? Determine your strategy and enrich your gaming experience!

Improve Your Skills and Have Fun
Snake Classic 3D Reborn is not only a means of entertainment for arcade and casual game lovers, but also an opportunity to develop your strategy and reflexes. Thanks to its fun and addictive gameplay, you can test your skills by playing this game. You can move faster and avoid obstacles by pressing the space bar to increase the speed of your snake. But you should be careful! If you hit the walls at the end of the map while accelerating, you will lose the game. Therefore, you should try to reach the highest score by thinking strategically and making quick decisions.

Snake Game Features
Impressive 3D Graphics: A visually enriched gaming experience designed with modern graphics.
Three Different Maps: Different maps, each offering unique challenges and visuals.
Eight Snake Skins: Add your personal touch with different snake styles unlocked with earned gold.
Fast and Fun Gameplay: A fast-paced game ideal for arcade and casual game lovers.

Meet Snake Classic 3D Reborn, which brings a new breath to the world of snake games! Fight in this magical world full of obstacles to collect points. This game, which offers an indispensable experience for fans of arcade games, snake games and platform games, is waiting for you.

name: Snake Classic 3D Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7950
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Dive into Snake Classic 3D Reborn! This exciting snake simulator features vibrant 3D graphics and three unique maps filled with challenges. Collect blocks to grow your snake, unlock various skins, and compete for the highest score.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
